author: djames
msg: Update new SWIG build system to run on Windows.
options, so that users can specify the path on Windows.
(Generator._is_executable): Try .exe extension on files, so that executable
files can be detecting on Windows.
(Generator._get_swig_version): Use popen3 to redirect stderr instead of
(Generator._get_apr_include_path): Use standard popen instead of call out
(Generator._checkout): Use os.remove and shutil.copy instead of shell
(Generator._write_external_runtime): Use python IO instead of shell commands.
